00001 #include "../../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00002 #include "CScrub.h"
00003 
00004 // The red creatures that follow the wall (ep2)
00005 
00006 enum scrub_actions{
00007  SCRUB_WALK,          // walking
00008  SCRUB_FALLING,       // oops, we fell off!
00009  SCRUB_DYING,         // getting fried!
00010  SCRUB_DEAD           // dead scrub! here's a dead scrub!
00011 };
00012 
00013 #define SCRUB_WALK_ANIM_TIME  11
00014 #define SCRUB_WALK_SPEED      25
00015 
00016 #define SCRUB_FALLSPDINCRATE   2
00017 #define SCRUB_MIN_FALL_SPEED  40
00018 #define SCRUB_MAX_FALL_SPEED  150
00019 
00020 #define SCRUBDIE_START_INERTIA      -10
00021 #define SCRUBDIE_INERTIA_DECREASE    2
00022 
00023 #define SCRUBPUSHAMOUNT       28
00024 
00025 // frames
00026 #define SCRUB_WALK_LEFT       102
00027 #define SCRUB_WALK_UP         104
00028 #define SCRUB_WALK_RIGHT      106
00029 #define SCRUB_WALK_DOWN       108
00030 #define SCRUB_FRY_FRAME       110
00031 #define SCRUB_DEAD_FRAME      111
00032 
00033 CScrub::CScrub(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00034   std::vector<CPlayer>& Player) :
00035 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_SCRUB),
00036 m_Player(Player)
00037 {
00038  walkdir = LEFT;
00039  state = SCRUB_FALLING;
00040  walkframe = 0;
00041  animtimer = 0;
00042  inhibitfall = true;
00043  needinit = false;
00044  canbezapped = 1;
00045 
00046  performCollisions();
00047  dead = 0;
00048  fallinctimer = 0;
00049  fallspeed = 0;
00050 
00051  SetAllCanSupportPlayer(1);
00052  for( size_t i=0 ; i<m_Player.size() ; i++ )
00053   kickedplayer[i] = 0;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void CScrub::process()
00057 {
00058  // after kicking a player, wait until he falls beneath the scrub
00059  // before turning cansupportplayer back on...just in case we check
00060  // for some other things to (when he stops falling, or if he jumps)
00061  for(size_t p=0;p<m_Player.size();p++)
00062  {
00063   if (kickedplayer[p])
00064   {
00065    if (m_Player[p].getYPosition() > getYPosition() || !m_Player[p].pfalling || m_Player[p].pjumping)
00066    {
00067     cansupportplayer = 1;
00068     kickedplayer[p] = 0;
00069    }
00070   }
00071  }
00072 
00073  // Check if scrub can push one player
00074  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00075  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00076  {
00077   if(touchPlayer)
00078   {
00079    if(it_player->getYDownPos() > getYMidPos())
00080    {
00081     if(it_player->getXMidPos() < getXMidPos() && walkdir != UP)
00082      it_player->push(*this);
00083     else if (walkdir != DOWN)
00084      it_player->push(*this);
00085 
00086    }
00087   }
00088  }
00089 
00090  if (canbezapped)
00091  {
00092   // if we touch a glowcell, we die!
00093   int x = getXPosition();
00094   int y = getYPosition();
00095   if (mp_Map->at((x+256)>>CSF, (y+256)>>CSF)==TILE_GLOWCELL)
00096   {
00097    solid=true;
00098    state = SCRUB_DYING;
00099    dying = true;
00100    dietimer = 0;
00101   }
00102   // die if shot
00103   if (HealthPoints <= 0 && state!=SCRUB_DYING )
00104   {
00105    solid=true;
00106    state = SCRUB_DYING;
00107    dietimer = 0;
00108    moveUp(10);
00109    scrubdie_inertia_y = SCRUBDIE_START_INERTIA;
00110    g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00111   }
00112  }
00113 
00114  switch(state)
00115  {
00116  case SCRUB_DYING:
00117   SetAllCanSupportPlayer(0);
00118   sprite = SCRUB_FRY_FRAME;
00119   moveYDir(scrubdie_inertia_y);
00120   if (scrubdie_inertia_y < SCRUB_MAX_FALL_SPEED)
00121    scrubdie_inertia_y+=2;
00122 
00123   dietimer = 0;
00124   if (scrubdie_inertia_y >= 0 && blockedd)
00125   {
00126    sprite = SCRUB_DEAD_FRAME;
00127    state = SCRUB_DEAD;
00128    dead = true;
00129    SetAllCanSupportPlayer(0);
00130   }
00131   return;
00132   break;
00133  case SCRUB_WALK:
00134 
00135   switch(walkdir)
00136   {
00137   case LEFT:
00138    walkLeft( (getXLeftPos())>>CSF, (getYMidPos())>>CSF);
00139    break;
00140   case RIGHT:
00141    walkRight( (getXRightPos())>>CSF, (getYMidPos())>>CSF);
00142    break;
00143   case DOWN:
00144    walkDown();
00145    break;
00146   case UP:
00147    walkUp();
00148    break;
00149   }
00150 
00151   // walk animation
00152   if (animtimer > SCRUB_WALK_ANIM_TIME)
00153   {
00154    walkframe ^= 1;
00155    animtimer = 0;
00156   } else animtimer++;
00157   break;
00158 
00159  case SCRUB_FALLING:
00160   fall();
00161   break;
00162  }
00163 }
00164 
00165 /*
00166  * Makes scrub walk to the left
00167  */
00168 void CScrub::walkLeft(int mx, int my)
00169 {
00170  sprite = SCRUB_WALK_LEFT + walkframe;
00171 
00172  if (blockedl)
00173  {
00174   sprite = SCRUB_WALK_UP + walkframe;
00175   walkdir = UP;
00176   Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked();
00177  }
00178  else
00179  {
00180   moveLeft(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00181 
00182   if(!blockedd)
00183   {
00184    // First check, if he can walk over the tile
00185    std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00186    if(!TileProperties[mp_Map->at(mx-1, my+1)].bup &&
00187     !TileProperties[mp_Map->at(mx-1, my)].bleft)
00188    {
00189     // There is no gap
00190     moveDown(2<<STC);
00191     moveRight(2<<STC);
00192     if(blockedr)
00193      walkdir = DOWN;
00194     else
00195      preparetoFall();
00196    }
00197   }
00198 
00199   std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00200   for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00201   {
00202    if ( it_player->supportedbyobject && it_player->psupportingobject==m_index &&
00203      it_player->pjumping!=PJUMPUP && it_player->pjumping!=PPOGOING)
00204    {
00205     if (!it_player->blockedl)
00206     {
00207      it_player->moveLeft(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00208     }
00209     else
00210     {
00211      it_player->pfalling = true;
00212      it_player->moveUp(1);
00213      it_player->moveDown(1);
00214     }
00215    }
00216   }
00217  }
00218 }
00219 
00220 /*
00221  * Makes scrub walk to the down
00222  */
00223 void CScrub::walkDown()
00224 {
00225  std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00226  sprite = SCRUB_WALK_DOWN + walkframe;
00227 
00228  if (blockedd)
00229  {
00230   walkdir = LEFT;
00231   sprite = SCRUB_WALK_LEFT + walkframe;
00232   Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked();
00233  }
00234  else
00235  {
00236   moveDown(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00237 
00238   if(!blockedr) // upper-right, if yes, go right! (ceiling)
00239   { // Move right
00240    walkdir = RIGHT;
00241    sprite = SCRUB_WALK_RIGHT + walkframe;
00242    moveRight(2<<STC);
00243    moveUp(2<<STC);
00244    SetAllCanSupportPlayer(0);
00245   }
00246 
00247   std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00248   for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00249   {
00250    if (it_player->supportedbyobject && it_player->psupportingobject==m_index &&
00251      it_player->pjumping!=PJUMPUP && it_player->pjumping!=PPOGOING)
00252    {
00253     // ensure that player is not blocked by a floor (can happen
00254     // in certain situations if player is hanging off the right side
00255     // of the scrub a bit)
00256     bool floor = false;
00257     if (!TileProperties[mp_Map->at((it_player->getXPosition()+128)>>CSF, (it_player->getYDownPos())>>CSF)].bup)
00258     { // lower-left isn't solid
00259      if (TileProperties[mp_Map->at((it_player->getXPosition()+384)>>CSF, (it_player->getYDownPos())>>CSF)].bup)
00260       floor = true;
00261     }
00262     else floor = false;
00263 
00264     if (!floor) it_player->moveDown(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00265    }
00266   }
00267  }
00268 }

00270 /*
00271  * Makes scrub walk to the right
00272  */
00273 void CScrub::walkRight(int mx, int my)
00274 {
00275  sprite = SCRUB_WALK_RIGHT + walkframe;
00276 
00277  if (blockedr)
00278  {
00279   walkdir = DOWN;
00280   sprite = SCRUB_WALK_DOWN + walkframe;
00281   Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked();
00282  }
00283  else
00284  {
00285   moveRight(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00286 
00287   if(!blockedu)
00288   {
00289    // First check, if he can walk over the tile
00290    std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00291    if(!TileProperties[mp_Map->at(mx+1, my-1)].bdown &&
00292     !TileProperties[mp_Map->at(mx+1, my)].bright)
00293    {
00294     // There is no gap the upper-side
00295     moveRight(4<<STC);
00296     moveUp(2<<STC);
00297     moveLeft(6<<STC);
00298     Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked();
00299     if(blockedl)
00300      walkdir = UP;
00301     else
00302      preparetoFall();
00303    }
00304   }
00305  }
00306 }
00307 
00308 /*
00309  * Makes scrub walk to the up
00310  */
00311 void CScrub::walkUp()
00312 {
00313  sprite = SCRUB_WALK_UP + walkframe;
00314  if (blockedu)
00315  {
00316   walkdir = RIGHT;
00317   sprite = SCRUB_WALK_RIGHT + walkframe;
00318   SetAllCanSupportPlayer(0);
00319  }
00320  else
00321  {
00322   moveUp(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00323 
00324   if( !blockedl )
00325   { // Move Left!
00326    walkdir = LEFT;
00327    sprite = SCRUB_WALK_LEFT + walkframe;
00328    Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked();
00329    moveLeft(2<<STC);
00330    moveDown(2<<STC);
00331   }
00332 
00333   std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00334   for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00335   {
00336    if (it_player->supportedbyobject && it_player->psupportingobject==m_index &&
00337      it_player->pjumping!=PJUMPUP && it_player->pjumping!=PPOGOING)
00338    {
00339     // kick player off if we're running him into the ceiling
00340     if (it_player->blockedu)
00341     {
00342      cansupportplayer = 0;
00343      kickedplayer[it_player->m_index] = 1;
00344     }
00345     else it_player->moveUp(SCRUB_WALK_SPEED);
00346    }
00347   }
00348  }
00349 }
00350 
00351 /*
00352  * Makes scrub fall
00353  */
00354 void CScrub::fall()
00355 {
00356  sprite = SCRUB_WALK_LEFT;
00357  if (blockedd)
00358  {
00359   walkdir = LEFT;
00360   state = SCRUB_WALK;
00361   walkframe = 0;
00362   animtimer = 0;
00363   Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked();
00364  }
00365  else
00366  {
00367   if (fallinctimer > SCRUB_FALLSPDINCRATE)
00368   {
00369    if (fallspeed < SCRUB_MAX_FALL_SPEED)
00370    {
00371     fallspeed++;
00372    }
00373    fallinctimer = 0;
00374   } else fallinctimer++;
00375 
00376   moveDown(fallspeed);
00377  }
00378 }
00379 /**
00380  * Prepares the grub to fall!
00381  */
00382 void CScrub::preparetoFall()
00383 {
00384  fallinctimer = 0;
00385  fallspeed = SCRUB_MIN_FALL_SPEED;
00386  state = SCRUB_FALLING;
00387  walkdir = LEFT;
00388  SetAllCanSupportPlayer(0);
00389 }
00390 
00391 
00392 void CScrub::Scrub_TurnOnCansupportWhereNotKicked()
00393 {
00394  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Player.size();i++)
00395  {
00396   if (!kickedplayer[i])
00397    cansupportplayer = 1;
00398  }
00399 }
00400 
00401 void CScrub::SetAllCanSupportPlayer(bool state)
00402 {
00403  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00404  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00405  {
00406   cansupportplayer = state;
00407   if(!state && it_player->supportedbyobject)
00408   {
00409    it_player->pfalling=true;
00410    it_player->moveDown(1);
00411    it_player->blockedd=false;
00412   }
00413  }
00414 }
